text: John Callie (born 1 March 1971) is a South African rower. He competed in the men's coxless pair event at the 1996 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:South African male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of South Africa Category:Rowers at the 1996 Summer Olympics Category:Rowers from Johannesburg
title: John Callie
